title: what do i do about this?
body: WHat happens if I crash while in ranked champ select? Because I crashed and I lost 3 lp and had to wait 5 minutes so what can I do to prevent this?

replies.body:
This is likely due to an unstable connection with the LoL servers.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and test in a custom game afterwards. 


http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
no it happens once in a while like the cclient just randomly closed while in champ select

If your client experiences a drop in connection during champ select, when it's super crucial for a stable connection, it can kick you out of champ select or even crash your client entirely. I strongly recommend working through the steps in the guide that *Rineyy* linked, as it provides the most common fixes for a poor connection to the servers. 

Let me know if you still see this issue after working through those steps.
